regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Pelicula: ', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.name: id3
search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Serie:', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d
